sense.gloss: one leaf (of a book bound in Japanese style)
one block of tofu, one serving (in a restaurant)
one long and narrow thing (e.g. a gun, scissors, spade, hoe, inkstick, palanquin, candle, jinrikisha, shamisen, oar)
one chō (unit of distance, approx. 109.09 m)

meanings: counter for guns, tools, leaves or cakes of something

sdata.j: ナイフが|↑一丁|↑↓いっちょう↓↑欲↑↓ほ↓しい。
トムは↑裸↑↓はだか↓にふんどし|↑一↑↓いっ↓↑丁|↑↓ちょう↓だった。
sdata.e: Tom was naked except for a loincloth.
